content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today?
Hi. I need an electrician, but I want to know if you can do it cheaper than your website says. Prices seem very high.
I understand price is important. For an accurate quote, could you please tell me exactly what kind of electrical work you need done?
It's just some outlets not working in the living room. Really, it shouldn’t cost that much. Are you able to offer a discount?

Thank you for that info. Outlet repairs usually have a standard rate depending on complexity, but I can see if a technician can provide you a precise estimate after assessment. May I have your full address to ensure we're servicing your area?
Sure, it’s 789 Maple Drive, Apt 2B. But I’ve seen electricians that charge way less for the same job, you know?
Thanks for the address. Let me quickly verify that we cover your area and check our schedule for availability.
Good news! We do serve your area and have upcoming availability. When would be a convenient time for us to send a technician?
Well, I was thinking maybe a weekend. Everyone else charges less though, so I’m not sure why I should pick XYZ.
We understand price is a big factor. XYZ prides itself on quality and safety with licensed experts. We also provide upfront pricing after inspection. What day this weekend works best for you?
Okay, maybe Saturday afternoon around 3 pm. But if your price isn’t right, I might cancel.
I’m booking your appointment for Saturday at 3 pm. Our technician will provide an exact quote before starting. If you have more questions or wish to reschedule, just let us know!
Alright, let’s see how that goes. Thanks for your help.
